entry.title: Introduction
entry.content: This is introductory post for the project Libre Car Control funded by Nlnet.

entry.title: Milestone 1
entry.summary:
This is to update on the first milestone that is archeived in Libre Car Control project.

  1. ECP5 based FPGA board boots up Linux using linux-on-litex-vexriscv.

  2. CTUCAN Controller IP in integrated in Litex.

  3. CTUCAN controller compiles with Litex build environment.
  4. CTUCAN controller is mapped to vexriscv core.

  5. Litex BIOS booting up â€¦
entry.content:
This is to update on the first milestone that is archeived in Libre Car Control project.

  1. ECP5 based FPGA board boots up Linux using linux-on-litex-vexriscv.

  2. CTUCAN Controller IP in integrated in Litex.

  3. CTUCAN controller compiles with Litex build environment.
  4. CTUCAN controller is mapped to vexriscv core.

  5. Litex BIOS booting up on ECP5 based FPGA board shows CTUCAN IP memory regions/CSRs at bootup.

  6. CTUCAN Controller Device Driver Bringup.

  7. ECP5 based FPGA board boots up a custom SOC with Linux on Litex vexriscv with CTUCAN controller IP.
  8. With insmod command opensource ctucan driver is inserted in Linux kernel, CAN Device in enumerated.
